name: Mine Mayhem (Rocket Ham Studios)
description:
In Mine Mayhem you play as a miner who is determined to get gold by any means necessary, even if it means endangering himself. This cartoony puzzle-platformer will have you carefully watch your health and time your jumps in order to avoid blowing yourself up or hitting the spikes and TNT littered around the various levels. The game features 60 hand-crafted puzzle-like levels offering about 2 hours of playtime,  with the final levels being a test of your skills and understanding of the game's mechanics. 

Controls: 

  • A : Move Left
  • D : Move Right
  • Shift (Left) : Grab onto wall
  • Space : Jump
